name: Erannorth Reborn
summary: Erannorth Reborn is a hardcore sandbox Card Game with heavy emphasis on Deck-Building, Character Customization and Moddability. Create unique characters with distinctive attributes, racial/class skills and perks that affect your cards.
info:
• 别名: 伊兰诺斯重生
  • 平台: PC

  • 发行日期: 2019年10月17日
  • 售价: $19.99 / ¥70
  • 开发: Spyridon Thalassinos
  • 发行: Spyridon Thalassinos
